name: Vice, crime and 2 guns in Miami city
name_original: Vice, crime and 2 guns in Miami city
description:
Continuing adventures of Carl nicknamed Grand Rifleman. After crime adventure in San Diego-city, decided come back to place of his childhood - Miami city. Here Carl got in street full of vice and sins. Carl realy need find two guns if he wants to be the crime king of Miami city. Carl again need help of his friend Tony and Tony's gang. But before this need do some dirty job for Tony.

This app includes:
- Crime simulator
- Beautiful Miami gta style landscape
- Thief auto on streets with throwing driver out of auto
- Banks and offices robbery
- Race in city and out
- Fights with fists and kick
- Many blows
- Moto, cars, auto, helicopters
- Interesting rap hip hop music
- Fun animations
- Interesting car theft
- Elements of Shooter game
- Elements of Strategy game
- Secret missions with cheat code
- Mad streets full of vice and sins

Download Vice, crime and 2 guns in Miami city for free and win the mafia war between city gangster bands
